properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 4:24AM PST until January 21 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Corrected headline wording.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph.
Wind prone locations along the US-395 corridor may see gusts
up to 55 mph.

* WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous crosswinds are expected, particularly for
high profile vehicles along US-395 between Susanville and the
Nevada stateline.
properties.instruction:
Secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, trash cans,
etc. Prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and
water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in
the event of a power outage.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PST THIS EVENING
